description.narrative: EAV is a pioneer in the off grid / access to energy sector and has to date built up an initial portfolio of six companies, including: three Solar Home Systems companies, a ‘gas for-cooking’ start-up and two ‘energy for agriculture’ businesses (solar irrigation and solar-based cold storage). EAV targets somewhere between 15-20 investees in order to secure sufficient diversification. FMO’s commitment will be deployed both in new investments as well as in (follow-on) investments in existing portfolio companies.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

provider-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
